SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.index

Class MessageIndex

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.index.MessageIndex
public class MessageIndex extends Object
Message index providing fast searching for a mailbox.

The index maintains:

  • Primary index: list of MessageIndexEntry sorted by UID
  • Flag sub-index: BitSet per flag for O(1) flag lookups
  • Date sub-index: sorted map for range queries on dates
  • Size sub-index: sorted map for range queries on sizes
  • Address sub-indexes: reverse lookup by individual email addresses
  • Keyword sub-index: reverse lookup by keyword

The index is loaded into memory when the mailbox is opened and saved to disk when the mailbox is closed (if modified).

File Format (.gidx): 

 HEADER (32 bytes):
   magic: 4 bytes ("GIDX")
   version: 2 bytes
   flags: 2 bytes (reserved)
   uidValidity: 8 bytes
   uidNext: 8 bytes
   entryCount: 4 bytes
   headerChecksum: 4 bytes (CRC32 of preceding 28 bytes)
 
 ENTRIES SECTION:
   For each entry: [entry data]
   sectionChecksum: 4 bytes (CRC32 of all entry data)

Note on progressive rebuild: Currently index building is synchronous. A future enhancement could implement progressive/background building where searches on non-indexed messages fall back to parsing, while newly indexed messages become searchable immediately.

Author:
Chris Burdess

    • MessageIndex

      public MessageIndex(Path indexPath, long uidValidity, long uidNext)
      Creates a new empty message index.
      Parameters:
      indexPath - path to the index file
      uidValidity - the mailbox UID validity
      uidNext - the next UID to assign

  • Method Details

      public boolean removeEntry(long uid)
      Removes an entry by UID.
      Parameters:
      uid - the UID to remove
      Returns:
      true if an entry was removed

    • updateFlags

      public void updateFlags(long uid, Set<Flag> flags)
      Updates flags for an entry.
      Parameters:
      uid - the message UID
      flags - the new flags

    • compact

      public void compact()
      Compacts the index by removing null entries and renumbering. Also updates message numbers sequentially.

    • search

      public List<Integer> search(SearchCriteria criteria)
      Searches for messages matching the criteria.

      Note: TEXT and BODY searches require message parsing and are not fully supported by the index. Use requiresMessageParsing(SearchCriteria) to check if parsing is needed.

      Parameters:
      criteria - the search criteria
      Returns:
      list of matching message numbers

    • getEntriesWithFlag

      public BitSet getEntriesWithFlag(Flag flag)
      Returns entries with a specific flag set.
      Parameters:
      flag - the flag to check
      Returns:
      BitSet of entry indices with the flag

    • getEntriesByInternalDateRange

      public Set<Integer> getEntriesByInternalDateRange(long fromDate, long toDate)
      Returns entries with internal date in the given range.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - start date (millis), inclusive
      toDate - end date (millis), exclusive
      Returns:
      set of entry indices
